div.div: Open Enrollment Dates: April 1 through May 31
There are two kinds of open enrollment in our district:

h3.span: District Efforts and Information on COVID-19

span.p: The Upper Sandusky Exempted Village School District is working closely with local, regional and state healthcare partners to monitor the rapidly-changing situation of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), in order to make the most well-informed decisions on behalf of our students, staff and community. I am writing to provide an update on our district’s efforts related to student, staff and community health and wellness.

h3.span: Upper Sandusky Exempted Village Schools… There’s an app for that!

span.p: That’s right, you can now keep up with all of the who, what, when and where for Upper Sandusky Exempted Village Schools through the Upper Sandusky Exempted Village Schools app by esv2go available on all mobile devices!

span.div: The Upper Sandusky Exempted Village School District is seeking substitute teachers, bus drivers, educational assistants, food service, custodians! Please contact Rhonda Caudill at the phone number below!
